Uses of Interface
checkersMain.CheckersGameListener

Packages that use CheckersGameListener
checkersGUI Provides the components for a GUI to allow a user to interact with the classes used to simulate a Checkers game. 
checkersMain Provides the main classes and interfaces needed to simulate a Checkers game. 
 

Uses of CheckersGameListener in checkersGUI
 

Classes in checkersGUI that implement CheckersGameListener
 class CheckersGUI
          A simple graphical user interface to allow humans and AI CheckerPlayers to play each other.
 class CheckersTrainer
          A graphical user interface designed to allow the user to have two groups of CheckersPlayerInterfaces play each other and keep track of the game outcomes.
 

Uses of CheckersGameListener in checkersMain
 

Methods in checkersMain that return CheckersGameListener
 CheckersGameListener[] CheckersGameManager.getCheckersGameListeners()
          Returns an array of the registered CheckersGameListeners.
 

Methods in checkersMain with parameters of type CheckersGameListener

          Registers a CheckersGameListener.
 void CheckersGameManager.removeCheckersGameListener(CheckersGameListener listener)
          Unregisters the passed CheckersGameListener.
